question: What is the Transformers TRL library and what is its purpose?
response: TRL, which stands for Transformer Reinforcement Learning, is a comprehensive library created to train Transformer language models using reinforcement learning. It offers tools for implementing the key stages of RLHF, including supervised fine-tuning (SFT), reward model training (RM), and Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO). TRL integrates with the Hugging Face Transformers library, making it easier to apply RLHF to existing Transformer models. You can explore the TRL library on Hugging Face at [https://huggingface.co/docs/trl/v0.7.8/index](https://huggingface.co/docs/trl/v0.7.8/index).
